Subject: Long time, no Halucigen
Message-ID: <3B682BE3.25367.A43E71F@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: gunthers@...

Halucigen looked around, still above the ruins of the Trainer base.  
He thought of going back to the Destrons, but they had not cared 
enough for him to check if he was all right. He then thought, long 
and hard, about who would be good to fight with.  Then a flashback 
hit him, back to his first fight on this planet, against a very worthy 
adversary, Prowl.  'Yes,' he decided ' I will go to the Maximals'  he 
then headed off south towards South Africa.
